== Requirement ==

For chapter 4, we must cover the following applications:

* Rhythmbox (audio)
* F-Spot (photo)
* Open Office (docs, spreadsheets, presentations, drawing)
* Tomboy (notes)
* Empathy (im)
* Firefox (web)
* Evolution (email)
* Totem (video)
* Ubuntu One (backup)
* Simple Scan (scanning) - this is included in Lucid by default. Shouldn't be too much work.
